K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288a-0: @288a *// 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288a-1: thal mo sbyar nas spyan sngar 'khod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288a-3: chos 'phags pa la sbyor ba de nyid las brtsams te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rdo rje'i lte ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rdo rje'i lte ba zhes bya bar gyur to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288b-19: de sgrib pa med pa'i mig gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:288b-20: grangs med pa rnams mthong zhing de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rab tu shes te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-1: kyang mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong zhing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-7: bdag mthong ba rnam par dag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-8: chos mthong ba rnam par dag pa la 'du shes gnyis su 'ang mi 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-10: de nyan thos mthong bas sangs rgyas mthong la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-12: yang dag par mthong bas mnyam par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na 'khod pa'i sems can gang dag sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289b-6: skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289b-12: de sems can rnams mthong zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa rab tu shes kyang bdag med pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas nas sems can rnams la sems can gyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289b-13: de lha'i mig des gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289b-14: dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs su snang ba de dag thams cad kyang snang ba tsam du rab tu shes so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:289b-17: de shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'dod na gzugs nye bar 'khor du gyur pa dang mtshungs par yang mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-1: na gzugs cung zad kyang yod ye mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-2: de srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i nang na 'dug kyang bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-5: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-6: sems can gang yang de'i mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-9: byang chub sems dpa' des bdag med pa'i de kho na shes pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-11: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i lus phra ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-15: lha'i bu de dag gi gis kyang de'i lus mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-16: des kyang de dag gi lus mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-17: 'dod na de'i lus lha rnams kyis mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-18: rang gi lus mi mthong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-22: de lha'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290a-23: 'di la 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sgra ji snyed yod pa lha'i sgra 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-1: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sgra de dag thams cad de'i lha'i rna ba'i dbang po de la grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-2: de sgra de dag thams cad thos kyang sgra tha dad par mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-3: sgra thams cad kyang smrar med par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-4: brjod du med par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-5: de sgra de dag kyang bdag tu 'du shes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-8: sgra thams cad thog ma'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-9: tha ma'i sgrar brjod pa med par rab tu rtogs shing chos thams cad brjod du med par yid ches so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-12: sgra rnams kyi don gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-15: sgra thams cad kyi don ni nye bar zhi ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-16: de don nges don la rtog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-17: sgra thams cad kyang thos la chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir gang la'ang gnas par mi byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:290b-19: chos kyang ston pa de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i rna bas thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291a-0: @291a *// kun nas dkris te 'dug par yang mi 'gyur la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-2: chos zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-10: yid kyi 'du byed spros pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-12: dor ba med pa de ni chos zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-13: de don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-15: de don la 'bab pa'i blos chos nyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-16: ji ltar na don la 'bab pa'i blo gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-17: gang stong pa nyid kyi don gyis lta bar mi ltung ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:291b-27: de ltar na nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:292b-2: de la mtshan mar yang mi 'dzin cing de rnam par shes pa la ye shes so zhes kun tu skyed de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:292b-11: lha'i rna ba thob pa des ye shes kyi dbyings 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:292b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de gang zag gi tshig bla dvags dang ldan pa'i chos nyan cing chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:292b-16: gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la gang zag yod par gyur na sems can gang yang shin tu dag pa dang thar bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-2: de lta bas na chos thams cad gang zag med mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gang zag ces gsungs so; ;de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-8: skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'byung ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-10: 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni brjod du med pa'i tshig bla dvags so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-13: gang brjod pa'i chos de dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-15: gang yod pa ma yin pa de bla dvags yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-16: de'i phyir tshig bla dvags zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293a-18: de langs tshig brjod pa med pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-2: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi tshig ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-3: gang sangs rgyas kyi tshig la 'jug pa de ni tshig med pa la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-4: gal te tshig la 'jug na sangs rgyas kyi tshig la 'jug pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-6: sangs rgyas kyi tshig la 'jug par 'dod pas tshig gang gis gang zag ces bya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-7: chos shes pa ston par gyur pa de tshig tu blta bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-9: gang la gnyis yod pa de sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-10: sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni gnyis su med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-11: gang la sgra yod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-12: sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni sgra med pa'o; ;gang la brjod pa yod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-13: sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni brjod pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-15: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi tshig la zhugs pa de ni mngon par shes pa thob pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-16: de lha'i rna ba des sgra thams cad chos nyid dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:293b-19: lha'i rna ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa gnyis pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-0: @294a *// 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-4: byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob cing sems kyis sems can gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-5: gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-7: gang du chos 'chad du 'gro bar de dang po nyid du sems can gang gi bsam pa ji lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-10: mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin snyam du 'khor gyi sems la rnam par lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-11: bltas nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-12: de rang gi sems yongs su dag pas 'khor gyi sems yongs su dag pa rjes su 'jug ste; rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-15: me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i phyir me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la gzugs su snang ba ji lta bu bsnyen pa'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-17: dbyibs ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu nyid kyi gzugs brnyan lhag chad med par snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294a-18: me long gi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par mi rtog mi sems kyang de dag snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang gi sems yongs su dag @294b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji lta bur 'byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems la sgrib pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-3: gzhan gyi sems la sgrib pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-4: de na gal te 'khor 'dod chags la spyod pa yin na'ang de'i sems rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-5: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-7: sems kyi rang bzhin chags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-8: gal te 'khor zhes sdang la spyod pa yin na'ang de'i sems rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-9: zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-11: sems kyi rang bzhin zhe sdang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-12: gal te 'khor gti mgu la spyod pa yin na'ang de'i sems rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-13: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-15: sems kyi rang bzhin ni gti mug ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-16: gal te 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa yin na'ang spyod pa de kho na bzhin du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-17: chos kyi dbyings chung bar yang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-18: gal te 'khor rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa yin na'ang spyod pa de kho na bzhin du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:294b-19: chos kyi dbyings 'bring du'ang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-1: 'khor theg pa chen po la mos pa yin na'ang spyod pa de kho na bzhin du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-2: chos kyi dbyings mchog tu'ang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-3: de sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi khams kyi spyod pa shes pas kyang chos ston la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-4: sems kyi rang bzhin la rnam par rtog pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-5: theg pa thams cad rnam par 'jog pas kyang chos ston la chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-6: chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-7: de sems kyis sems la rnam par lta la sems kyis sems la spyod par mi byed cing mi mthun par yang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-8: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi dbyings de dag kyang rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-9: chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de sems kyi dbyings yin par rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-11: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-12: mngon par shes pa des lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295a-14: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob cing de brjod pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-0: dbang po mnyam par bzhag pas sngon gyi @295b gnas rjes su dran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-2: gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas la bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas brtsams nas chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-3: che ge mo zhig na bdag ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-5: tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-7: sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-8: sems can gzhan rnams kyi'ang de bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-9: de sems can rnams sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu las byung ba rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-10: sems can 'di dag ni rgyu'i stobs can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-11: 'di dag ni rkyen gyi stobs can; ;sems can 'di dag gi rgyu ni nyan thos kyi theg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-12: sems can 'di dag gi rgyu ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-13: sems can 'di dag gi rgyu ni theg pa chen po'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rgyu shes nas de dag la de bzhin du chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-14: de sngon gyi gnas mngon du byed pas sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa thob po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-15: de sangs rgyas rnams la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa bskyed pa byang chub tu yongs su ma bsngos pa de dag rjes su dran par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:295b-16: de sngon gyi gnas kyang rjes su dran la chos thams cad sngon gyi mthar 'pho ba med par yang rab tu shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-0: gang yang sngon gyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba med par @296a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-2: phyi ma'i mtha' nas sngon gyi mthar 'gro ba med par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-3: chos thams cad gang du'ang 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-4: 'ong ba med par rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-5: de sngon gyi mthar rjes su dran pa na sngon gyis mthar lta bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-6: de phyi ma'i mtha' rjes su dran pa na phyi ma'i mthar lta bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-8: dbus med par yang rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-9: de sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyang rjes su dran la gzugs sngon gyi mthas dben pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-13: rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthas dben pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-14: de phung po lnga char sngon gyi mthas dben pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-15: phyi ma'i mthas dben pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-16: da ltar byung bas dben pa nyid du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-17: de chos thams cad sngon gyi mthas stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-18: da ltar byung bas stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-19: phyi mthas stong pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-21: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-22: las mngon par 'du bya ba sngon byas pa'ang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296a-24: des chos thams cad gsar pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-0: rnying pa ma yin @296b par shes pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-1: des shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas 'du byed du gtogs pa rnams rmi lam lta bur mos par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-4: rmi lam na skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-7: sdug bsngal rmi ba de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad la mos par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-8: de de ltar mos pas 'khor ba las skyo bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-9: sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-10: chos thams cad la bcos mar 'du shes su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-11: de 'di snyam du bdag bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed gcig tu 'khor bar gyur pa de yang dag par ma yin zhing med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-12: 'byung ba chen po rnams ni med pas gang nas 'byung ba chen po rnams mi srid pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'khor pa'ang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-13: yang dag par ma yin zhing med pa'o snyam du mi sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa de 'byung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-16: 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa nyid du mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-18: de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde ba rjes su dran pa de'ang mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-20: brgya byin gyi bde ba rjes su dran la de'ang mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:296b-22: tshangs pa'i bde ba rjes su dran la de'ang mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-2: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-3: nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa nye bar spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-5: yongs su spyod pa rjes su dran zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang rjes su dran no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-7: de de ltar rjes su dran pa ni 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-8: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mi lta ba'i 'du shes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-10: 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-11: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku de dag kyang zad pa'i chos nyid kyi zad pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-12: de bas na bdag gi yongs su gzung ba 'di'ang mi rtag go snyam du sems shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-13: de bdag gi yongs su gzung ba mi rtag pa nyid la'ang ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297a-17: 'du byed thams cad shin tu mi rtag na sems can rnams rtag par 'du shes so snyam du de sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye zhing dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-0: 'di ni byang chub sems @297b dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-1: dngos po thams cad mi rtag par yang rtogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-2: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa rnams su bsam bzhin du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-3: yongs su 'dzin pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su gzung ba yongs su 'dzin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-4: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyi phyir nye bar len pa med par nye bar len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-6: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-8: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-11: dpyod pa las sems la dbang po'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-12: de shin tu cher mngon par 'dus byas pa med par rdzu 'phrul mngon du 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-13: de 'dod na sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro zhing der song ba'ang shes la 'di nas kyang mi g-yo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-14: de na chos ston par yang snang la 'di na gtam brjod pa'i rgyun yang mi 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:297b-16: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-0: rnam par 'phrul pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis gdul ba'i sems @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-1: can rnams gdul bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-4: sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa de dag la sreg pa'i bskal pa nye bar ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-5: de na stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshig par de dag gis mthong la 'jig rten gyi khams de zhig par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-6: sems can gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can de dag la ni gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su nye bar ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-7: de rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs par byed pas de dag 'jigs par byas nas de dag nga rgyal med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-9: gang dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i kha dog la mos pa de dag la ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-11: gang dag brgya byin gyi kha dog la mos pa de dag la ni brgya byin gyi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-13: gang dag bdud kyi kha dog la mos pa de dag la ni bdud kyi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-15: sems can gang dag tshangs pa'i kha dog la mos pa de dag la ni tshangs pa'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-18: sangs rgyas kyi kha dog la mos pa de dag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298a-19: de lta bu'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-0: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi kha @298b dog la mos pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-2: de sems can kha cig la ni nam mkha' la skyil mo krung du 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-3: 'od rnams las 'od zer phyung ste chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-4: de sems can rgya chen po la mos pa rnams la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla bre bres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-5: dar gyi chun kor gyi phreng ba dpyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-12: sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma gsil pa bstan nas chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-13: sems can kha cig la ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-16: padma dkar pos khebs par byas nas de'i dbus su seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-17: de la bdag 'dug nas chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-18: sems can kha cig la ni ri rab kyi rtse mo la bdag 'dug par bstan nas tshangs pa'i sgrar smra ba'i dbyangs kyis chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-19: sems can kha cig la ni lus mi snang bar sgra snyan par grags pa'i rnam par rig byed kyis chos ston; sems can kha cig la ni dri za'i gzugs kyis glu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:298b-20: rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dga' ba'i sbyor bar chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:299a-0: sems can kha cig la ni klu'i dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor @299a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:299a-4: char gyi rgyun 'bab pa bstan nas chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:299a-6: skom pas nyen pa kha cig la ni lha'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:299a-7: btung ba byin nas bde bar gyur pa la chos ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:299a-8: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag sdug bsngal gyis shin tu gzir ba de dag la ni rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus sems can dmyal ba'i me zhi bar byas nas spu'i bu ga thams cad du gzi byin bcug ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-12: der bslab pa bca' ba'ang med de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-14: de dag la gtam rgyas par bya'ang mi dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-15: de dag ni zur tsam gyis go zhing dbang po rnob sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-16: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-17: mi ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis bshad pa de kun shes par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-18: de la kha cig gis ni bzod pa thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-20: kha gcig gis ni spobs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331a-21: kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan kyang phyogs bcur grags @331b par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-2: de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid rgyas par 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-4: de na byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dri med rnam dag 'od ces bya ba zhig kyang yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-6: de bzhin gshges pa des byang chub sems dpa' de lung yang ma bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-8: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan pa de dag spyod lam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-17: ting nge 'dzin thob pas bdag las lhag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-18: mchog tu gyur pa ni med ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-19: ci'i phyir 'dir de dang gi lun bstan la bdag lung ma bstan snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po de'i thugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-22: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba zhig 'gyur ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:331b-23: de khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-1: sems dpa' dri med rnam dag 'od kyis tshig de thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-3: gal te bskal pa gangng'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de 'byung du zin kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni shob bo mi gsung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yang dag par gsungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-7: zhes tshig de skad smras so; ;rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-9: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dri med rnam dag 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-11: nga nyid de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dri med rnam dag 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-13: de'i tshu rol na de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal zhes bya ba ngas mnyes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-14: de las kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-16: snang ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-17: de'i tshu rol na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba mnyes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332a-18: de las kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-0: snang @332b ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-1: de'i tshu rol na de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya ba mnyes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-2: de las kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-4: rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-5: de'i tshu rol na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdung ba zhes bya ba mnyes par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-6: de las kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-8: rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-9: de'i tshu rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba mnyes par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-10: de las kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-11: tshul khrims kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-12: mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-13: shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-14: shes rab kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-15: rnam par 'phrul ba bzhi po de dag kyang mngon su mdu byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-17: rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-21: rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:332b-24: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-0: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par tshton pa de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @333a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-1: pa'i byang chub kyi phyir mngon par shes pa myur ba dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-2: chos kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di rnams kyang thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-3: thob nas kyang chos kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa 'di la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong gis bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-6: srog chags 'bum phrag bcu gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-9: klu 'bum dag kyang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de nas sangs rgyas 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-10: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ma yin na gang dag gis bzungs nas kun chub par byed pa'i bar du gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-11: de dag ni ring por mi thogs par rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-0: @333b chos kyis rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-3: rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-7: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-11: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-13: 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ///
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-14: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a warma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-010:333b-15: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
